business.start.para: The SPEAKER (Mr Neil Andrew) took the chair at 9.30 a.m., and read prayers.

debate.para: Mr ABBOTT (WarringahâLeader of the House) (9.31 a.m.)âGiven the importance of the prayer service that is about to begin, I move:

motion.para: That the House do now adjourn.

talk.start.para: âAs a mark of respect, the House stands adjourned until 12.30 p.m. on Monday, 11 November.
